keyEvents.description: Captain Kuro arrives at the battlefield
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes the site of the climactic confrontation

keyEvents.description: Zoro defeats the Nyaban Brothers with Tora Gari
keyEvents.significance: The first use of Zoro's signature technique occurs at this location
The location witnesses the emotional confrontation between Kaya and her betrayer

keyEvents.description: Kuro reveals his true feelings and three-year deception
keyEvents.significance: The most devastating revelation of the arc occurs at this location

reveals.description: This coastal area was the planned site for the Black Cat Pirates' attack on Syrup Village
